un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
title: Untitled
computation_calculations:
n=(N/P)*1000 
 n - crude birth rate 
 N - number of live births 
 P - estimated midyear population
computation_definitions: Crude birth rate is the ratio of number of livebirths and estimated mid year population, per 1000 of inhabitants.
comments_limitations: Crude birth rates per 1,000 inhabitants for the period 1996-2004 are calculated based on estimates of the present population, and for the period 2005-2022 they are calculated in relation to the estimated number of inhabitants based on the data of the 2013 Census.
